basics.label: Senior Product Development Manager
basics.summary: Respected Retail Professional who leverages expertise in production, negotiation, supplier management, and relationship building skills, to drive and deliver solid business results. Highly adept with working with cross-functional teams and key stakeholders to maximize business opportunities.

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Created a robust Product Development Team that interacts with Design and Sales in partnership with the parent company TAL, the world's leading manufacturer of Men's high quality dress shirts. Created structure and organization to build a Product Development team that executes to strict time & action guidelines.
highlights: Created a robust Product Development Team
Developed Processes and Systems to improve workload efficiencies and improve timing of deliverables

work.name: Company Name
work.summary: Served as a key member of JCPenney's private label sourcing team. Leveraged extensive knowledge of cotton rich products, fabric construction, and garment production, and drove the execution of strategic global sourcing activities.
highlights: Produced cost savings of millions of dollars over multiple programs

volunteer.summary: Volunteered at Texas Collin County's largest Homeless Shelter.
